sentence.Network_en: 'I neither want any thanks, nor merit any,'was the careless rejoinder.
sentence.Network_cn: “ 我不需要感谢, 也不值得感谢, ” 回答是满不在乎的一句.

sentence.Network_en: She always has a witty rejoinder to any question.
sentence.Network_cn: 她对待任何问题总能机智地回答。

sentence.Network_en: In rejoinder, the abolitionists question the superior deterrent value of the death penalty.
sentence.Network_cn: 废除死刑者在答辩中对死刑具有最大的威慑价值表示怀疑.

PerfectNetExp.abs: rejoin 再加入rejoinder 反驳rejudge 重新判断

PerfectNetExp.exp: 被告向原告第二次答辩
PerfectNetExp.abs: 2012年11月27日 - 被告向原告第二次答辩 rejoinder  被害人 victim  被害人的诉讼代理人 victim's agent ad litem  被上诉人 respondent; the appellee  被申请人.
憔悴的，消瘦的 ；assiduous刻苦的，勤奋的；rejoinder回答；corroborate
rejoinder 第二次答辩, rejoinder 答辨, rejoinder 第二答辩

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Anglo-Norman French rejoindre (infinitive used as a noun) (see rejoin)

entry.def: A rejoinder is a reply, especially a quick, witty, or critical one, to a question or remark.

means.word_mean: 1. a quick reply to a question or remark (especially a witty or critical one);

sentences.sentence: "it brought a sharp rejoinder from the teacher"

means.word_mean: 2. (law) a pleading made by a defendant in response to the plaintiff's replication

auth_sentence.content: Rose gritted her teeth, biting back the rejoinder.
auth_sentence.res_content: Rose gritted her teeth, biting back the rejoinder.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Rose gritted her teeth, biting back the rejoinder.

auth_sentence.content: But there's an immediate rejoinder from the sceptics.
auth_sentence.res_content: But there's an immediate rejoinder from the sceptics.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But there's an immediate rejoinder from the sceptics.

auth_sentence.content: Less clear is whether Dawkins agrees with the driver's final rejoinder.
auth_sentence.res_content: Less clear is whether Dawkins agrees with the driver's final rejoinder.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Less clear is whether Dawkins agrees with the driver's final rejoinder.

stems_affixes.word_buile: adjoin[v.邻接, 毗连]+ing……的→adj.邻接的, 隔壁的
disjoin[v.[使]分开, [使]分离]+t+ed表形容词→分开的
join结合,连接+t→n.接合处,接头;关节adj.联合的,共同的,连接的
join结合,连接+t→n.接合处,接头;关节adj.联合的,共同的,连接的
re反+join结合,连接+der→反过来接→回答
ad再+join结合,连接→再连上→毗连
dis分开+join结合,连接→连接分开
en进入+join结合,连接→进入连接→命令加入

stems_affixes.value_cn: 参加,加入;联合,连接;和……在一起
stems_affixes.word_buile: join结合,连接→v.参加,加入;联合,连接;和……在一起
sub在下面+join结合,连接→在下面接上→增补
